title: Loudmouth

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Keep watch outside a player's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will know who their visitors are, unless they are killed or roleblocked.
- If your target dies, you will learn their attacker's name.
- If you stay home, you will announce the names of your visitors at the start of the next day, even if you die.

desc:

*You scream, and hear nothing in turn. Can they hear you?*
